summary: Puts a better night vision power in the game.
descriptionHtml:
This mod puts a better night vision power in the game without blur and without the bluish color.

To install:
Put the esp in the data folder, I don't use mod manager but that probably works too.

To add the power:
1) put in the console: help "day vision" --> press enter
2) look for "SPEL: (NUMBER) 'day vision'"
3) player.addspell NUMBER
author: sjmortepop
